narrative.narrative: Gorkha Airlines is a domestic carrier in Nepal that has been around since 1996. As of June 2010 from Kathmandu it was flying to Bhairahawa,Bharatpur,Janakpur,Lukla,Pokhara,Simara,and Tumlingtar. It was also going from Pokhara to Jomsom and between Tumlingtar and Biratnagar. At March 2007 it had two Dornier 228-212's. It had started with two Mil-17 helicopters but switched to fixed wing when it started scheduled service. It had at least one Dornier in 2000 or earlier.
